origins.question: What island is considered the Principle Island of the Ryukyu Archipelago?
Who is believed to have brought Chuan-Fa to the Shaolin temple in China during the Sung Dynasty?
What event in 1609 led to the development of a fighting method known as 'Te' (hand)?
options: Japanese Satsuma Clan's march on the Ryukyu Islands
Declaration of allegiance by King Satto
origins.correctAnswer: Japanese Satsuma Clan's march on the Ryukyu Islands
